attributes.action: Stop any future UK entry to the Euro vision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Eurovision Song Contest has no artistic merit what so ever and the voting system is unfair and unregulated causing countries from a similar union to vote for each other. There is no place for the UK in such an unregulated and unfair competition.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
